trait.name: Aberrant Surge
entries: When the ruffian casts {@spell Witch Bolt|XPHB}, roll {@dice 1d8}. On an even number, the ruffian gains a number of {@variantrule Temporary Hit Points|XPHB} equal to the number rolled. On an odd number, one creature of the ruffian's choice within 30 feet of it takes Force damage equal to the number rolled; if no other creatures are in range, it takes the damage.

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atkr m,r} {@hit 4}, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) Piercing damage.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The ruffian casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Constitution as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 12}, {@hit 4} to hit with spell attacks):
